response.original_title: An Uninvited Guest In A Villa
response.overview: This story is about a person who is in debt  When he accidentally killed a rich man  It was filmed about what will happen next.  Because Wan Ying has lost money while playing shares and is in debt  From his schoolmate during an emergency  While trying to borrow money, he overreached and pushed himself off the cliff  When he went to the rich man's house to pick up valuable items while he was acting  Due to Yuan Thein's (50) attraction, he could not leave the rich man's house  I got greedy and went on.  Will he be able to escape the attraction of these possessions...  Will you be able to get away from making mistakes?
response.title: An Uninvited Guest In A Villa
